Detailed Description

"ccafe.ports.MPIService": UNADOPTED-standard service for getting a private mpi comm.

As MPI Forum explicitly DOES NOT define an interlanguage form for object (comm, group, etc) handles, we use the FORTRAN form which, being an integer of some size <= long in SIDL, we will express in SIDL as a long. Implementations in C/C++/Python will have to use appropriate conversion operators, MPI_Comm_c2f/MPI_Comm_f2c etc, when passing/receiving object handles in long form.

Member Function Documentation

long ccaffeine.ports.MPIService.getComm (   )  throws gov.cca.CCAException
 

Get an mpi communicator with the same scope as the component instance.

Won't be mpi_comm_null. The communicator returned will be private to the recipient, which implies an mpicommdup.

Returns:
The comm produced, in FORTRAN form. C callers use comm_f2c method defined by their mpi implementation, usually MPI_Comm_f2c, to convert result to MPI_Comm.
Exceptions:
CCAException if the service cannot be implemented because MPI is not present.

void ccaffeine.ports.MPIService.releaseComm (  in long  comm  )  throws gov.cca.CCAException
 

Let go the communicator.

previously fetched with getComm.

Exceptions:
CCAException if an error is detected.
